meanings.definition: The state or position of being a collector.
meanings.sent1: Her collectorships of stamps and coins filled every corner of the room.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed various collectorships of ancient artifacts.
meanings.sent3: His collectorships of rare books made him the envy of all book lovers.
meanings.sent4: In her eyes, his love for collectorships was as vast as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The auction featured unique collectorships that attracted many bidders.

meanings.definition: The practice or activity of collecting items.
meanings.sent1: The collectorships of antiques at the flea market were impressive.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the collectorships of seashells she gathered on the beach.
meanings.sent3: His collectorships of action figures made him feel like a kid again.
meanings.sent4: The collectorships of memories in her mind were priceless.
meanings.sent5: The hobby store offered a wide range of collectorships for enthusiasts.
